spatial.by_location: function (doc, meta) { if (doc.type == "city") { emit({ "type": "Point", "coordinates": doc.loc}, null); } }
spatial.by_location_with_city_name: function (doc, meta) { if (doc.type == "city") { emit({ "type": "Point", "coordinates": doc.loc}, { "cityState" : doc.name + "," + doc.state }); } }
